General.Name: Solvbl Solutions Inc
General.Description: Solvbl Solutions Inc. operates as a cybersecurity and data authentication company in Canada. The company offers Q by SoLVBL, a proprietary technology platform; QSeals by SoLVBL, a scalable data verification solution for a digital world; Q-Server by SoLVBL, a secure, scalable, high speed, low latency cloud based server used to generate QSeals; and digital evidence management systems. Solvbl Solutions Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: First Canadian Place, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5X 1C7

1.Name: Mr. Khurram R. Qureshi C.A., CPA, CA, CPA
